post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 FutureTek

주소 Canada Ontario  
  York-Weston / Dufferin-St.Clair

홈페이지  

회사소개 FutureTek is working within a strategic alliance of independent recruiters across Canada and the United States. Our focus is strictly the IT vendor market.


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 COBOL programmer with ETI

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  As soon as possible

급여 $60,000.00 to $70,000.00 Yearl

근무지 Canada   Ontario York-Weston / Dufferin-St.Clair  


지원자격
학력 Completion of high school  

자격증  

경력 6 - 9 years

필요한기술 Good knowledge of COBOL, SQL, MVS, Relational Databases. Good understanding of Project Life Cycle and associated documentation. Strong analytical and problem solving skills. Strong communication skills. Involves technical investigation, design and development for projects that will be adding new data structures to the existing Data Warehouse Environment. Develop programs using ETI -Extract which is used to generate all the code required to build the ETL processes within the DWE.

기타 Operating Systems: VMS
Hardware Environment: IBM mainframes, VAX mainframes
Programming Languages: COBOL



지원방법
지원방법 By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 - -  

이메일 HELENA@FUTURETEKCONSULTANTS.COM
post.title: COBOL programmer with ETI
